Array2d.name: Array2d
Array2d.description:
Manages a 2d array of values mapped to x,y coords.
coord data methods to help with data maniuplation and searching (getAdjacent, findNearest, filter, getWithinSquareRadius etc.)

params.name: width
params.description: - Width of the 2d Array.

params.name: height
params.description: - Height of the 2d Array.

Console.name: Console
Console.description:
Manages the display and history of console messages to the user.
"The troll hits you dealing 10 damage."
"You die."

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

params.name: messageHistoryCount
params.description: - Number of messages to display at once.

params.name: elClassName
params.description: - Css class name to assign to the console element.

EntityManager.name: EntityManager
EntityManager.description:
Manages a list of all entities and their tile positions.
Handles adding, removing, moving entities within the game.

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

params.name: width
params.description: - Width of current map in tiles.

params.name: height
params.description: - Height of current map in tiles.

Entity.name: Entity
Entity.description:
Represents an entity in the game. Usually a character or enemy.
Manages state (position, health, stats, etc)
Occupies a single game map tile.

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

params.name: type
params.description: - Type of entity. When created this object is merged with the value of Entity.Types[type].

Entity.Types.name: Entity.Types

FovROT.name: FovROT
FovROT.description: Represents a FovROT in the game map. requires ROT.js

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

Game.name: Game
Game.description:
Container for all game objects.
Handles updating the state of game objects each turn.
Listens for player input to trigger and resolve new turns.

Input.name: Input
Input.description: Helper for binding user key input to actions.

params.name: onKeyAction
params.description: - Function called when a key bound to an action is pressed (function(action){}).

params.name: bindings
params.description: - An object of key val pairs mapping an action to an array of keys that trigger it. Input.Keys is used to convert input key string names to key codes.

Lighting.name: Lighting
Lighting.description:
Represents lighting in the game map. requires ROT.js
Manages position of lights.
Calculates illumination of map tiles.

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

params.name: settings
params.description: Lighting settings object.

props.name: range
props.description: - Maximum range for the most powerful light source.

props.name: passes
props.description: - Number of computation passes (1: no reflectivity used, 2: reflectivity used)

props.name: emissionThreshold
props.description: - Minimal amount of light at a cell to be re-emited (only for passes>1).

Map.name: Map
Map.description: Manages map Tiles. Depends on Array2d (array-2d.js).

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

Mouse.name: Mouse
Mouse.description: Helper for handling user mouse input.

params.name: onClick
params.description: - A function to handle mouse click events. function(x, y){}

params.name: onHover
params.description: - A function to handle mouse hover events. function(x, y){}

Player.name: Player
Player.description:
Represents the player.
Very similar to Entity
Handles functionality triggered by keyboard and mouse Input

params.name: game
params.description: - game instance this obj is attached to

Renderer.name: Renderer
Renderer.description: Renders the current game state using html5 canvas.

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

params.name: width
params.description: - Width of the map view in tiles.

params.name: height
params.description: - Height of the map view in tiles.

params.name: canvasClassName
params.description: - Css class name for the canvas element.

Tile.name: Tile
Tile.description: Represents a tile in the game map.

params.name: game
params.description: - Game instance this obj is attached to.

params.name: type
params.description: - Type of tile. When created this object is merged with the value of Tile.Types[type].

params.name: x
params.description: - The map tile coordinate position of this tile on the x axis.

params.name: y
params.description: - The map tile coordinate position of this tile on the y axis.

Tile.Types.name: Tile.Types

classitems.description: Width of the 2d Array.
classitems.name: width

classitems.description: Height of the 2d Array.
classitems.name: height

classitems.description: 2d Array data
classitems.name: data

classitems.description: Resets the 2d array, clearing all data and initializing with this.width and this.height.
classitems.name: reset

params.name: width
params.description: - The new width.

params.name: height
params.description: - The new height.

classitems.description: Updates the size of this Array2d without destroying data.
classitems.name: setSize

params.name: width
params.description: - The new width.

params.name: height
params.description: - The new height.

classitems.description: Sets a value at given coords.
classitems.name: set

params.name: x
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the value being set.

params.name: y
params.description: - Position on the y axis of the value being set.

params.name: value
params.description: - The value being set at given coords.

classitems.description: Gets a value from given coords.
classitems.name: get

params.name: x
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the value being retrieved.

params.name: y
params.description: - Position on the y axis of the value being retrieved.

classitems.description: Removes a value from given coords.
classitems.name: remove

params.name: x
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the value being removed.

params.name: y
params.description: - Position on the y axis of the value being removed.

classitems.description: Retrieves an array of values of adjacent coords.
classitems.name: getAdjacent

params.name: x
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the coord to get adjacent values of.

params.name: y
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the coord to get adjacent values of.

params.name: withCoords
params.description: - If true the returned array will include the coords of each value ([{x: 0, y: 0, value: 1}, ...])

params.name: filter
params.description: - A function to filter the values returned (function(value, x, y){ return true;})

return.description: An array of adjacent coord values.

classitems.description: Retrieves an array of values of coords within a given radius.
classitems.name: getWithinSquareRadius

params.name: x
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the coord at the center of the radius.

params.name: y
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the coord at the center of the radius.

params.name: radius
params.description: - Radius of the area to retrieve tiles from.

params.name: filter
params.description: - A function to filter the values returned (function(value, x, y){ return true;})

params.name: withCoords
params.description: - If true the returned array will include the coords of each value ([{x: 0, y: 0, value: 1}, ...])

params.name: includeTarget
params.description: - If true the value of the coordinates given will be included in the returned array.

return.description: An array of coord values within a square radius of the given coords.

classitems.description: Retrieves an array of values of coords along a line starting at point 0 and crossing point 1 until it hits the edge of the 2d array or a coord value returning true when passed to the condtion function.
classitems.name: getLineThrough

params.name: x0
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the coord 0.

params.name: y0
params.description: - Position on the y axis of the coord 0.

params.name: x1
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the coord 1.

params.name: y1
params.description: - Position on the y axis of the coord 1.

params.name: condition
params.description: - A function to determine when to end the line. A coord value returning true when passed to the function will end the line. (function(value, x, y){ return true;})

params.name: withCoords
params.description: - If true the returned array will include the coords of each value ([{x: 0, y: 0, value: 1}, ...])

classitems.description:
Retrieves an array of the nearest coord values meeting checked requirements. If multiple coord values were matched at the same nearest distance, the returned array will contain multiple matched coord values.
Used for projecting path of ranged attacks, pushed entities, ect.
classitems.name: getNearest

params.name: tileX
params.description: - Position on the x axis of the coord at the center of the radius.

params.name: tileY
params.description: - Position on the y axis of the coord at the center of the radius.

params.name: maxRadius
params.description: - Maxium search radius from given coord.

params.name: check
params.description: - A function to determine when the desired coord value is matched. A coord value returning true when passed to the function would be added to the list of results. (function(value, x, y){ return true;}) If no check function is provided any tile with a truthy value will be matched.

params.name: withCoords
params.description: - If true the returned array will include the coords of each value ([{x: 0, y: 0, value: 1}, ...])

return.description: An array of coord values within a square radius of the given coords.

classitems.description: Retrieves an array of the filtered values.
classitems.name: filter

params.name: check
params.description: - A function to determine if a value is to be included in results (returns true). (function(value, x, y){ return true;})

params.name: withCoords
params.description: - If true the returned array will include the coords of each value ([{x: 0, y: 0, value: 1}, ...])

return.description: An array of coord values matched by the check function.

classitems.description: Creates a copy of this Array2d. Shallow copies values.
classitems.name: copy

classitems.description: Loops over each coord value.
classitems.name: each

params.name: func
params.description: - A function to call on each coord value. (function(value, x, y){})

params.name: context
params.description: - Context to call the function with (func.call(context, val, x, y))

classitems.description: Game instance this obj is attached to.
classitems.name: game

classitems.description:
Element containing console messages.
Must be manually added to the DOM
classitems.name: el

classitems.description: Number of messages to display at once.
classitems.name: messageHistoryCount

classitems.description: Adds a message to the console.
classitems.name: log

params.description: Message to be added.

classitems.description: Game instance this obj is attached to.
classitems.name: game

classitems.description: Array containing all entities.
classitems.name: entities

classitems.description: Array2d containing all entities by their current map tile coord
classitems.name: entityMap

classitems.description: Retrieves an entity by map tile coords.
classitems.name: get

params.name: x
params.description: - The map tile coordinate position of the entity on the x axis.

params.name: y
params.description: - The map tile coordinate position of the entity on the y axis.

classitems.description: Adds an entity to the manager.
classitems.name: add

params.name: x
params.description: - The map tile coordinate position of the entity on the x axis.

params.name: y
params.description: - The map tile coordinate position of the entity on the y axis.

params.name: ent
params.description: - The Entity being set at given coords. If ent is a string a new Entity will be created using the string as the Entity Type (see Entity.Types[type]).

classitems.description: Removes an entity to the manager.
classitems.name: remove

params.name: ent
params.description: - The entity to be removed.

classitems.description: Changes the position of an entity already added to this entityManager.
classitems.name: move

params.name: x
params.description: - The new map tile coordinate position of the entity on the x axis.

params.name: y
params.description: - The new map tile coordinate position of the entity on the y axis.

params.name: ent
params.description: - The entity to be removed.

classitems.description: Calls the entity.update() method on all entities. Removes dead entities. Typically called after a player has resolved their actions.
classitems.name: update

classitems.description: Resets this entityManager.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: Sets the size of the map to manage entities within.
classitems.name: setSize

params.name: width
params.description: - Width of current map in tiles.

params.name: height
params.description: - Height of current map in tiles.

classitems.description: Loads Entity data from an array of strings.
classitems.name: loadEntitiesFromArrayString

params.name: mapData
params.description: - The array of strings to load.

params.name: charToType
params.description: - An object mapping string characters to Entity types (see Entity.Types[type]). Characters in mapData not in charToType are ignored.

params.name: replaceCurrentEntities
params.description: - If true current entities at positons of entities being added will be removed. Otherwise new entities at occupied positions will be skipped.

classitems.description: Game instance this object is attached to.
classitems.name: game

classitems.description:
The type of entity this is.
When created this object is merged with the value of Entity.Types[type].
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: Called when the entity is first created. Intended to be assigned by Entity.Types.
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description:
Name used when referencing or describing this entity.
Used in console messages.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The x map tile coord of this entity.
classitems.name: x

classitems.description: The y map tile coord of this entity.
classitems.name: y

classitems.description: The character displayed when rendering this entity.
classitems.name: char

classitems.description: The color of the character displayed when rendering this entity. Not rendered if false.
classitems.name: color

classitems.description: The background color the character displayed when rendering this entity. Not rendered if false.
classitems.name: bgColor

classitems.description: Determines if this entity has been killed and needs to be removed.
classitems.name: dead

classitems.description: Determines if this entity can be pushed by the player.
classitems.name: pushable

classitems.description: Called after a player action has been resolved. Resolves this entities turn.
classitems.name: update

classitems.description:
Checks if an entity can move through a map tile.
Convenience method for this.game.canMoveThrough()
classitems.name: canMoveThrough

params.name: x
params.description: - The tile map x coord to check if this entity can move to.

params.name: y
params.description: - The tile map y coord to check if this entity can move to.

classitems.description:
Checks if an entity can move through and into a map tile and that tile is un-occupied.
Convenience method for this.game.entityCanMoveTo()
classitems.name: canMoveTo

params.name: x
params.description: - The tile map x coord to check if this entity can move to.

params.name: y
params.description: - The tile map y coord to check if this entity can move to.

classitems.description:
Changes the position of this entity on the map.
Convenience method for this.game.entityMoveTo()
this.canMoveTo() and/or this.canMoveThrough() should always be checked before calling this.moveTo()
classitems.name: moveTo

params.name: x
params.description: - The tile map x coord to move to.

params.name: y
params.description: - The tile map y coord to move to.

classitems.description:
Checks if a map tile can be seen through.
Convenience method for this.game.entityCanSeeThrough()
classitems.name: canSeeThrough

params.name: x
params.description: - The x map tile coord to check.

params.name: y
params.description: - The y map tile coord to check.

classitems.description: Handles the behavior of a player or other entity attempting to move into the tile coord this entity is currently occupying.
classitems.name: bump

params.name: entity
params.description: - The player or entity attemplting to move into this entity's tile.

classitems.description: Array2d storing fovROT visibility fovMap
classitems.name: fovMap

classitems.description: Field Range of view 90, 180, or 360.
classitems.name: fieldRange

classitems.description: Direction of fov (used as default) (not used for fieldRange 360) valid directions: ['up', 'down', 'left', 'right', 'up_left', 'up_right', 'down_left', 'down_right'].
classitems.name: direction

classitems.description: Max visible distance in tiles
classitems.name: maxViewDistance

classitems.description: All visible map tiles
Validates a fieldRange value.
classitems.name: validateFieldRange

params.name: fieldRange
params.description: - Field Range of view valid values: `90`, `180`, or `360`.

classitems.description: Converts a string direction to an rot direction
classitems.name: directionStringToArray

params.name: direction
params.description: - Direction of fov (used as default) (not used for fieldRange 360) valid directions: ['up', 'down', 'left', 'right', 'up_left', 'up_right', 'down_left', 'down_right'].

classitems.description: Calculates the fovROT data relative to given coords.
classitems.name: update

params.name: x
params.description: - The map coordinate position to calculate FovROT from on the x axis.

params.name: y
params.description: - The map coordinate position to calculate FovROT from on the y axis.

params.name: [fieldRange
params.description: = this.fieldRange || 360] - Field Range of view 90, 180, or 360.

params.name: [direction
params.description: = this.direction || 'up'] - Direction of fov (not used for fieldRange 360) valid directions: ['up', 'down', 'left', 'right', 'up_left', 'up_right', 'down_left', 'down_right'];.

params.name: [maxViewDistance
params.description: = this.maxViewDistance] - Max visible distance in tiles.

params.name: entity

params.name: x

params.description: - The map coord position to set.

classitems.description: Gets all objects at tile position
classitems.name: getObjectsOnTile

classitems.description:
Checks if an entity can move through a map tile.
This does NOT check for entities on the tile blocking movement.
This is where code for special cases changing an entity's ability to pass through a tile should be placed.
Things like flying, swimming and ghosts moving through walls.
classitems.name: entityCanMoveThrough

params.name: entity
params.description: - The entity to check.

params.name: x
params.description: - The x map tile coord to check.

params.name: y
params.description: - The y map tile coord to check.

classitems.description: Checks if an entity can move through and into a map tile and that tile is un-occupied.
classitems.name: entityCanMoveTo

params.name: entity
params.description: - The entity to check.

params.name: x
params.description: - The x map tile coord to check.

params.name: y
params.description: - The y map tile coord to check.

classitems.description:
Changes the position of an entity on the map.
Updates entity position in this.entityManager and calls tile.onEntityEnter
this.entityCanMoveTo() should always be checked before calling this.entityMoveTo
classitems.name: entityMoveTo

params.name: entity
params.description: - The entity to move.

params.name: x
params.description: - The tile map x coord to move to.

params.name: y
params.description: - The tile map y coord to move to.

classitems.description:
Checks if a map tile can be seen through.
This is where code for special cases like smoke, fog, x-ray vision should go.
classitems.name: entityCanSeeThrough

params.name: x
params.description: - The x map tile coord to check.

params.name: y
params.description: - The y map tile coord to check.

classitems.description: An object of key val pairs mapping keyCode to action
classitems.name: bindings

classitems.description: Function called when a key bound to an action is pressed (function(action){}).
classitems.name: onKeyAction

classitems.description: Bind a user action to a key input
classitems.name: bindAction

params.name: action
params.description: - The action to bind the key to.

params.name: keyName
params.description: - The keyname to bind the action to. @see Input.Keys

classitems.description: Converts a user input key code to an action bound to that key or false if none is bound.
classitems.name: getActionFromKeyCode

params.name: keyCode
params.description: - The key code to retrieve an action bound to.

return.description: String|bool The action bound to the keyCode or false.

classitems.description: Loads multiple action key bindings
classitems.name: addBindings

params.name: bindings
params.description: - An object of key val pairs mapping an action to an array of keys that trigger it. Input.Keys is used to convert input key string names to key codes.

classitems.description:
Event handler for document.addEventListener('keydown', this). Triggered when a key is pressed.
If an action is bound to the key pressed, false is returned to cancel the default browser behavior of the keypress.
If an action is not bound to the key pressed, true is returned allowing the default browser behavior of the keypress to function.
classitems.name: handleEvent

params.name: event
params.description: - The onkeydown event.

classitems.description: Binds event listener for document keydown event.
classitems.name: startListening

classitems.description: Unbinds document keydown event listener
classitems.name: stopListening

classitems.description: FovRot instance representing this entity's vision.

classitems.description:
Name used when referencing describing this player.
Used in console messages.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: The map tile coordinate position of the player on the x axis.
classitems.name: x

classitems.description: The map tile coordinate position of the player on the y axis.
classitems.name: y

classitems.description: The character displayed when rendering this player.

classitems.description: The color of the character displayed when rendering this player.
classitems.name: color

classitems.description: The background color the character displayed when rendering this player.

classitems.description: Field Range of this.fov (90, 180, or 360)
classitems.name: fovFieldRange

classitems.description: Direction of fov (not used for fieldRange 360) valid directions: ['up', 'down', 'left', 'right', 'up_left', 'up_right', 'down_left', 'down_right'].
classitems.name: fovDirection

classitems.description: Max visible distance in tiles
classitems.name: fovMaxViewDistance

classitems.description: Determines if the player has been killed.
classitems.name: dead

classitems.description: Updates this.fov
classitems.name: updateFov

classitems.description: Checks if this entity can move to the specified map tile
classitems.name: canMoveTo

params.name: x
params.description: - The tile map x coord to check if this entity can move to.

params.name: y
params.description: - The tile map y coord to check if this entity can move to.

classitems.description:
Changes the position of this entity on the map.
this.canMoveTo() should always be checked before calling this.moveTo
classitems.name: moveTo

params.name: x
params.description: - The tile map x coord to move to.

params.name: y
params.description: - The tile map y coord to move to.

classitems.description: Called when user key is pressed with action of key pressed as an arg.
classitems.name: update

params.name: action
params.description: - action bound to key pressed by user

params.name: x
params.description: - Map tile cood to move to.

classitems.description: Canvas element this renderer draws to.

classitems.description: Background color of map view.
classitems.name: bgColor

classitems.name: nonVisibleTileAlpha

classitems.description: Size of each tile is drawn.
classitems.name: tileSize

classitems.description: Font used to render tile characters.
classitems.name: font

classitems.description: Device pixel ratio for high dpi screens.
classitems.name: devicePixelRatio

classitems.description: Map view width in tiles.
classitems.name: width

classitems.description: Map view height in tiles.
classitems.name: height

classitems.description: The x distance in tiles from center to upper left corner of map view.
classitems.name: offsetX

classitems.description: The y distance in tiles from center to upper left corner of map view.
classitems.name: offsetY

classitems.description: The map tile x coord of the tile drawn in the upper left corner of the map view.
classitems.name: originX

classitems.description: The map tile y coord of the tile drawn in the upper left corner of the map view.
classitems.name: originY

classitems.description: The map tile x coord of the tile currently being hovered by the mouse.
classitems.name: hoveredTileX

classitems.description: The map tile y coord of the tile currently being hovered by the mouse.
classitems.name: hoveredTileY

classitems.description: Resizes canvas elements to match the tileSize and map view with/height. Also adjusts behavior to accomodate high pixel density screens.
classitems.name: resize

classitems.description: Converts mouse pixel coords to map tile coords. Mouse pixel coords must be relative to the current window.
classitems.name: mouseToTileCoords

params.name: x
params.description: - Mouse pixel x coord.

params.name: y
params.description: - Mouse pixel y coord.

classitems.description: Converts map view pixel coords to map tile coords. Map view pixel coords are relative to the top left of the canvas element.
classitems.name: pixelToTileCoords

params.name: x
params.description: - Map view pixel x coord.

params.name: y
params.description: - Map view pixel y coord.

classitems.description: Sets the center map tile of the view.
classitems.name: setCenter

params.name: centerX
params.description: - Center map tile x coord.

params.name: centerY
params.description: - Center map tile y coord.

The type of entity this is.
When created this object is merged with the value of Tile.Types[type].

classitems.description: The color of the character displayed when rendering this tile. Not rendered if false.
classitems.name: color

classitems.description: The background color the character displayed when rendering this tile. Not rendered if false.

classitems.name: bump

params.description: - The player or entity attemplting to move into this tile.
